about.details:
Incorporated in 2012, Trekkingtoes.com Limited offers travel aggregator platform and cab rental services online. The customers can book the cabs through website (www.hippocabs.com), mobile app (HippoCabs) and call booking service.

It has more than 4000 registered vehicles and 1500 vendors for intercity services. The company provides route specific approach (enabling the client to pay only for one way and for drivers to have customers on both the sides) and dynamic pricing model across 200 cities in India.

The company is also engaged in offering Currency Conversion, Software Consultancy, and Data Base trading Services in India as well as international markets.

Competitive Strengths

1. Skilled and dedicated manpower
2. Stringent quality control process
3. A route specific approach for customer
4. Dynamic price algorithm

faqs.question: What is the Hippo Cabs IPO?
faqs.answer:
Hippo Cabs IPO is a SME IPO of 433200 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.54 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹105 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on August 18, 2020, and closes on August 20, 2020.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Hippo Cabs IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Hippo Cabs IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Hippo Cabs IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Hippo Cabs IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Hippo Cabs IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Hippo Cabs IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Hippo Cabs IPO opens on August 18, 2020 and closes on August 20, 2020.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Hippo Cabs IPO?
faqs.answer: Hippo Cabs IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,26,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Hippo Cabs IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Hippo Cabs IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Hippo Cabs IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Hippo Cabs IPO will be done on Tuesday, August 25, 2020, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, August 27, 2020. Check the Hippo Cabs IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Hippo Cabs IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Hippo Cabs IPO listing date is on Friday, August 28, 2020.
